Defines

#define BSP_USE_SPHERES
 If uncommented, bounding spheres will be used for faster polygon classification against planes. (Eg. on front, on back, spanning).
#define BSP_DEFAULT_EPS   0.001
 Epsilon value to keep floating point happy and minimize splits. This value should generally be as small as possible, without breaking the proper function of the BSP compiler.
